name: Name
desc: Description/Prompt

name: Qi Refinement Sword
desc: An iron sword forged by a local blacksmith, barely usable.

name: Qi Refinement Saber
desc: A thick-backed chopper, a favorite of ordinary martial artists.

name: Qi Refinement Spear
desc: Made of white wax wood, with a red tassel on the spearhead.

name: Qi Refinement Staff
desc: A common hardwood staff, as long as the eyebrows.

name: Qi Refinement Fan
desc: A folding fan commonly used by scholars and literati for elegance.

name: Qi Refinement Whip
desc: A common leather whip, mostly used for driving carts or punishment.

name: Qi Refinement Zither
desc: An ancient zither made of paulownia wood, with fair sound quality.

name: Qi Refinement Flute
desc: Carved from purple bamboo, with a crisp sound.

name: Qi Refinement Hidden Weapon
desc: Commonly seen iron hidden weapons.

name: Azure Frost Sword
desc: The sword qi is bone-chillingly cold.

name: Moon in the Well
desc: The saber light is like the moon reflected in a well, unpredictable.

name: Fire Tipped Spear
desc: Faint fire light on the spearhead, able to trigger common fire.

name: Dragon Capturing Rod
desc: Forged from refined iron, weighing a thousand jin, usable by those with great strength.

name: Peach Blossom Fan
desc: Falling peach blossom shadows like flying divine swords; peach blossoms painted on the fan, hiding killing intent.

name: God Striking Whip
desc: An imitation; although lacking the power to strike gods, it can wound the soul.

name: Heavenly Demonic Zither
desc: The zither sound is demonic, disturbing the mind.

name: Ghost Flute Chenqing
desc: Said to be able to control corpse puppets with this flute.

name: Shadowless Needle
desc: Fine as a cow's hair, coming and going without a trace, impossible to guard against.

name: Ten Thousand Beasts Flute
desc: Specially made by the Baishou Sect; the flute sound can soothe or provoke beasts.

name: Blood Drinker Mad Saber
desc: The saber body is red, appearing to crave blood.

name: Black Iron Heavy Sword
desc: Heavy sword without edge, great skill requires no craftsmanship, Dugu Qiubai's favorite.

name: Ziwei Soft Sword
desc: Soft as a belt, moving like a spiritual snake.

name: Water and Fire Dragon Capturing Staff
desc: A standard weapon of the Zhenhun Sect, combining water and fire to trap enemies and lock souls.

name: Green Bamboo Bee Cloud Sword
desc: A set of flying swords containing evil-warding divine thunder, restraining all evil in the world.

name: As-You-Will Iron Rod
desc: The weapon of the Six-Eared Macaque, changing as desired, as large or small as one wishes.

name: Five Fires Seven Poultry Fan
desc: The fan surface features five fires including air fire, stone fire, and wood fire, turning things to ashes in one wave.

name: God Killer Spear
desc: Surging killing intent, once stained with the blood of demon gods; the spear never returns once thrown.

name: Red Point Spear
desc: Red point spear, immortal shield, slaying all immortal kings and destroying nine heavens.

name: Immortal Slaying Flying Dagger
desc: A trace of light hidden in a red gourd, with eyebrows and eyes. Please turn around, treasure, for gods and ghosts cannot escape.

name: Immortal Slaying Sword
desc: Neither copper, iron, nor steel, once hidden under Mount Sumeru. Sharp qi pierces directly into the nine heavens.

name: Gan Jiang and Mo Ye
desc: Swords of true love, one female and one male, killing when separated, amorous when together.

name: Plantain Fan
desc: Essence leaf of Taiyin; one wave stops fire, two waves create wind, three waves bring rain.

name: Purple Gold Demon Subduing Pestle
desc: Wei Hu's weapon; although light and agile, it hits with the weight of Mount Tai.
